mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (title, content, summary, category_id, user_id, status, view_count, is_top, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{viewCount}, #{isTop}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, summary=#{summary}, category_id=#{categoryId}, user_id=#{userId}, status=#{status}, view_count=#{viewCount}, is_top=#{isTop}, create_time=#{createTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, summary, category_id, user_id, status, view_count, is_top, create_time, update_time FROM note WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, content, summary, category_id, user_id, status, view_count, is_top, create_time, update_time FROM note ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, content, summary, category_id, user_id, status, view_count, is_top, create_time, update_time FROM note WHERE user_id=#{userId}
